items.title: Viral call-recording app Neon goes dark after exposing users’ phone numbers, call recordings, and transcripts
items.summary: Call recording app Neon was one of the top-ranked iPhone apps, but was pulled offline after a security bug allowed any logged-in user to access the call recordings and transcripts of any other user.

Trump says Xi Jinping approved the TikTok deal, and JD Vance says the transaction values TikTok US at $14B; ByteDance hasn't acknowledged the deal  —  President Donald Trump on Thursday signed an executive order approving a proposed deal that would keep TikTok alive in the U.S.

items.title: Trump signs order declaring TikTok sale plan meets US requirements
items.summary: WASHINGTON (Reuters) -President Donald Trump signed an executive order on Thursday declaring that his plan to sell TikTok's U.S. operations to U.S. and global investors will meet the requirements in a 2024 law that says the short video app will be banned unless its Chinese owners sell it. It would normally cost you $1,099 were you buying it at full price, which we’ve mainly seen dropped down to $999 and $899 rates over 2025, with some falls as low as $599 that only appeared once back in July. You’re looking at the next-best price while the $400 savings last here, giving you a much more affordable commuter that doubles on saving space when not in use.

It's a method called microfluidics that involves liquid coolant flowing directly into the silicon. After lab tests, Microsoft found that this strategy can remove heat up to three times better than […]

While they were already a super affordable option when they debuted recently at $13, they have now dropped down to $9.99 with free shipping for primetime members or in orders over $35. items.title: Add LEGO’s soon-to-be-retired 2,103-piece Ideas Viking Village set with four minifigures at $104 (Reg. $130)
items.summary:
Over at Target, you can currently score the soon-to-be-retired LEGO Ideas Viking Village set for $103.69 shipped, which is not available at Amazon and keeps to its $130 MSRP direct from LEGO’s website. Since its release back in 2023, we’ve only seen a handful of discounts pop up in the last two years, mostly in 2024. While it has gone lower in the past, the 20% markdown still gives you a rare chance at $26 off the going rate, with LEGO also deeming it to be retired in the foreseeable future, so you won’t want to miss out while it’s still around at this price (with rates often jumping up at other marketplaces once sets are retired).

items.title: Microsoft cuts cloud services to Israeli military unit over Palestinian surveillance
items.summary: The investigation was sparked by a story in The Guardian that reported that Unit 8200, the elite Israel military intelligence unit, was using Azure cloud storage to house data on phone calls obtained through the surveillance of Palestinians in Gaza and the West Bank.

items.title: Slovenia projects 2.9 pct budget deficit in 2026
items.summary: LJUBLJANA, Sept. 25 (Xinhua) -- Slovenia expects a budget deficit of 2.9 percent of gross domestic product in 2026, just under the eurozone's 3 percent limit, the government said Thursday. The deficit is forecast to ease to 2.8 percent in 2027, but remain above the 2.6 percent planned for 2025. Read full story

items.title: Walmart’s GeForce Week sale event serving up to $800 off RTX 5070 gaming PCs, more from $699
items.summary:
Walmart’s GeForce Week sale is still in full swing, with big savings on RTX 50-series gaming laptops and desktops – starting as low as $699. We’ve highlighted some of our favorites right here, so be sure to check them out before the sale ends later this week. The sale has been live for a couple of days now, and the prices on several RTX 5070-powered gaming PCs have dropped even further, and that’s a big deal because the 5070 is widely considered the sweet spot of the entire lineup. It delivers performance close to the higher-tier models without the premium price tag, making it arguably the best value you can get right now. If you’re in the market to buy a gaming PC with an RTX 5070 GPU, we’ve rounded up the top models currently available at Walmart below.

This particular bundle usually goes for $900, so you’re getting a $251 discount. Today’s 28% discount marks the return of the lowest price it first hit during the previous Prime Day sale, making this is a great time to snag it for your battlestation. This discounted bundle delivers solid value today, considering just the monitor by itself without the included arm is currently fetching its full price separately at $750. Head below for more details.

Mifa Leather Silicone Hybrid Apple Watch Band

Buy for $22 (Reg. $28)

Clip the on-page $3 off coupon.

What we love

I love me a proper full-grain leather Apple Watch band from time-to-time, but there’s no denying how pricey they can be. If you’re looking for that vibe I have had great experience with Mifa Apple Watch bands in the past and this delivers that leather facade with the more sport-friendly rubber interior I have come to appreciate as well.
